HomePage.title: The <gradient>Full-Stack</gradient> Developer.
HomePage.paragraph: I make accessible, high-performance websites with strong SEO and clean code. My portfolio is in the development process; in the meantime, feel free to contact me via email, GitHub, and LinkedIn.
HomePage.description: Furkan EryÄ±lmaz is a skilled full-stack developer with extensive experience in creating high-performance, SEO-friendly websites. Proficient in modern frameworks like Next.js, SvelteKit, and Laravel, he specializes in front-end and back-end development, responsive design, and optimizing web applications for speed and usability. His expertise includes multilingual website creation, web performance optimization, and integrating advanced technologies to deliver user-friendly digital solutions.

Metadata.title: Full-Stack Developer | Furkan EryÄ±lmaz
Metadata.description: Portfolio of Furkan EryÄ±lmaz, a full-stack software developer specializing in high-performance web development, clean code, SEO, and user-centric design.

DescriptionSection.title: I make <rotate></rotate> websites.
DescriptionSection.description: I am a <primary>full-stack developer</primary> who wants to make the most out of websites. Whether the case is <underline>presence</underline>, <underline>functionality</underline>, <underline>accessibility</underline>, <underline>speed</underline>, or <underline>a fancy design</underline>, I strive to utilize what a website can do with the most solid principles.
DescriptionSection.didYouKnowFStar: The nickname F* (F-Star) is inspired from the searching algorithm "A*" in artificial intelligence and my initial.

HeadStart.top: I don't want you to keep going;
HeadStart.bottom: I want you to want to keep going.

initial.getStarted: Select a project to get started
initial.learnMore: Click on a tab above to learn more.

tt.details: Previously titled "Multiple Timer", this is a versatile productivity tool as a merge of to-do apps and Pomodoro timers. Users can create plans which has described steps which may or may not have a duration. It is under maintenance to add improvements and features such as public / private plans and bookmarking others' plans.

em.details: Developed an online exam platform which assesses the exam questions' difficulty and discrimination for future exams to be healthier and more sustainable.

te.details: Using the existing ticket entries, we developed a fine-tuned chatbot which precisely responds to tickets opened by customers.

mm.details: Developed a mobile app for school services (notifications, announcements, student information, weekly / monthly meals, etc.). As a frontend developer, I participated in engineering and coding user interfaces for dynamic data.

initial.getStarted: Select an experience to get started
initial.learnMore: Click on a tab above to learn more.

details.1: Coded user interfaces that display and handle incoming and ongoing dynamic data of delivery details.
Developed an OCR system that reads passport / identity card images and extracts their information for customer management.
details.2: Designed and developed an admin panel UI that includes personnel management and the OCR system to handle incoming images.

details.1: Delivering and sustaining high performance and search engine optimized websites for our partners with inclusive frontend & backend tech stacks.

Contact.title: I am obliged to thank you for your effort to spend time with me.
Contact.music: We take shelter in music to feel things we cannot in real life.
